products.title: Quintessence Paloma Roman Blind
products.metadescription:
Add a gentle and delicate accent to your home with this gorgeous quintessence paloma roman blind. 
With a rich, slubby texture, this beautiful fabric will give your room a subtle detailing whilst working perfectly to create a soft and smoky highlight in your home.
